gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Kings 127, Jazz 106
gameRecap.excerpt: The Kings defeated the Jazz, 127-106 as they snapped a two-game skid to move to 43-31. Keegan Murray led the Kings with 25 points as De’Aaron Fox (24 points, 12 assists, six rebounds) and Domantas Sabonis (17 points, 11 rebounds, six assists) added 41 points. Collin Sexton had 22 points and four assists for Utah. The Jazz fell to 29-46 on the year.
